channel.itunes:keywords: foolish, talk, frenzy, darby, matt, talking, middlebrook, minnesota, university, umn
channel.title: Foolish Talk and Frenzy
channel.itunes:author: Matt & Darby
channel.description: Two friends from the University of Minnesota Twin-Cities, Matt and Darby, host a podcast in which they converse at length on a wide variety of topics.
channel.itunes:summary: Two friends from the University of Minnesota Twin-Cities, Matt and Darby, host a podcast in which they converse at length on a wide variety of topics.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Matt and Darby's vibes abound.

item.title: S0E2: We're Taking This Too Seriously (Pilot Episode)
item.description: After months of restless anticipation, we are proud to present the inaugural episode of the Foolish Talk and Frenzy Podcast! Listen to Matt and Darby discuss jam, dreams, and life in this 30-minute audio extravaganza! *This episode is in no way affiliated with the office of Joan Gabel* *If you are a writer for the movie "Weekend at Bernie's", your discretion is strongly advised* Please give us feedback: https://forms.gle/iHHYCEikCBRnUjtF6
item.itunes:summary: After months of restless anticipation, we are proud to present the inaugural episode of the Foolish Talk and Frenzy Podcast! Listen to Matt and Darby discuss jam, dreams, and life in this 30-minute audio extravaganza! *This episode is in no way affiliated with the office of Joan Gabel* *If you are a writer for the movie "Weekend at Bernie's", your discretion is strongly advised* Please give us feedback: https://forms.gle/iHHYCEikCBRnUjtF6
item.itunes:subtitle: "We want this to be a good, high quality podcast."

item.title: S1E1: A Little Toe Dip in the Pool
item.description: On the premier episode of foolish talk and frenzy, Matt and Darby dive into the world of grocery stores, nails, art philosophy, sound effects, and so much more. They’re not afraid to ask the tough questions, such as “what kinds of sounds are we making?” and “what’s yaws?” Join them as they introduce themselves to “the podcast world”. *if you answered the previous google form and asked about sounds, proceed with caution* *if you eat jam with seeds in it, proceed with double caution*
item.itunes:summary: On the premier episode of foolish talk and frenzy, Matt and Darby dive into the world of grocery stores, nails, art philosophy, sound effects, and so much more. They’re not afraid to ask the tough questions, such as “what kinds of sounds are we making?” and “what’s yaws?” Join them as they introduce themselves to “the podcast world”. *if you answered the previous google form and asked about sounds, proceed with caution* *if you eat jam with seeds in it, proceed with double caution*
item.itunes:subtitle: Matt and Darby investigate the world's mysteries.

item.title: S1E2: Double Shoelace Blowout!
item.description: "Bedtime Stories is a 2008 American fantasy comedy film directed by Adam Shankman and written by Matt Lopez and Tim Herlihy. It stars Adam Sandler in his first appearance in a family-oriented film alongside Keri Russell, Jonathan Morgan Heit, Laura Ann Kesling, Guy Pearce, Aisha Tyler, Russell Brand, Richard Griffiths, Teresa Palmer, Lucy Lawless and Courteney Cox. Sandler's production company Happy Madison and Andrew Gunn's company Gunn Films co-produced the film with Walt Disney Pictures. The film was theatrically released on December 25, 2008 by Walt Disney Pictures. Despite receiving generally negative reviews from critics, it was a box office success after earning $212.9 million against an $80 million budget." Wikipedia, the Free encyclopedia.
item.itunes:summary: "Bedtime Stories is a 2008 American fantasy comedy film directed by Adam Shankman and written by Matt Lopez and Tim Herlihy. It stars Adam Sandler in his first appearance in a family-oriented film alongside Keri Russell, Jonathan Morgan Heit, Laura Ann Kesling, Guy Pearce, Aisha Tyler, Russell Brand, Richard Griffiths, Teresa Palmer, Lucy Lawless and Courteney Cox. Sandler's production company Happy Madison and Andrew Gunn's company Gunn Films co-produced the film with Walt Disney Pictures. The film was theatrically released on December 25, 2008 by Walt Disney Pictures. Despite receiving generally negative reviews from critics, it was a box office success after earning $212.9 million against an $80 million budget." Wikipedia, the Free encyclopedia.
item.itunes:subtitle: How many times can you see Cats?

item.title: S1E3: A Cul-De-Sac in the Lives of Matt and Darby
item.description: Join us for some intense meta-discussion on podcasts on this episode of the Foolish Talk and Frenzy podcast! If you enjoyed the episode, or if you did not enjoy the episode, please send us an email at foolishtalkandfrenzy@gmail.com! *warning: abundant Darby cackling* Hi, mom!
item.itunes:summary: Join us for some intense meta-discussion on podcasts on this episode of the Foolish Talk and Frenzy podcast! If you enjoyed the episode, or if you did not enjoy the episode, please send us an email at foolishtalkandfrenzy@gmail.com! *warning: abundant Darby cackling* Hi, mom!
item.itunes:subtitle: In which Darby leaves Cinnamon Toast Crunch below the dispenser.

item.title: S1E4: You're a Tour Guide Now!
item.description: Matt and official University of Minnesota tour guide Darby give a mock tour of the campus buildings. *warning: controversial building ratings ahead* To voice your opinion on these ratings, please send an email to foolishtalkandfernzy@gmail.com! Thank you for listening! Love you mom!
item.itunes:summary: Matt and official University of Minnesota tour guide Darby give a mock tour of the campus buildings. *warning: controversial building ratings ahead* To voice your opinion on these ratings, please send an email to foolishtalkandfernzy@gmail.com! Thank you for listening! Love you mom!
item.itunes:subtitle: In which Darby claims Walter Library is overrated.

item.title: S1E5: Manufacturing Artificial Struggle
item.description: This week, Matt and Darby are getting places, whether by bus, light rail, plane, or people mover! In this LocoMotion-themed episode, your hosts share anecdotes about the interesting ways they've gotten from point A to point B. Feeling inspired by transportation? Transport your thoughts over the Internet by sending an email to foolishtalkandfrenzy@gmail.com or by leaving us a review on Apple Podcasts!
item.itunes:summary: This week, Matt and Darby are getting places, whether by bus, light rail, plane, or people mover! In this LocoMotion-themed episode, your hosts share anecdotes about the interesting ways they've gotten from point A to point B. Feeling inspired by transportation? Transport your thoughts over the Internet by sending an email to foolishtalkandfrenzy@gmail.com or by leaving us a review on Apple Podcasts!
item.itunes:subtitle: The episode that never loses its direction.

item.title: S1E6: Clothes, Open!
item.description: Finding yourself in need of fashion advice by the two most fashionable people you know? Look no further than this weeks's episode of the Foolish Talk and Frenzy podcast in which your hosts, Matt and Darby, talk about clothes, outfits, accessories, ensembles, and so much more! *warning: Matt does his laundry* Questions? Concerns? Good jokes? Email us at foolishtalkandfrenzy@gmail.com! Matt's recommended listening: https://soundcloud.com/malik-khadar/avocado-toast
item.itunes:summary: Finding yourself in need of fashion advice by the two most fashionable people you know? Look no further than this weeks's episode of the Foolish Talk and Frenzy podcast in which your hosts, Matt and Darby, talk about clothes, outfits, accessories, ensembles, and so much more! *warning: Matt does his laundry* Questions? Concerns? Good jokes? Email us at foolishtalkandfrenzy@gmail.com! Matt's recommended listening: https://soundcloud.com/malik-khadar/avocado-toast
item.itunes:subtitle: WAMWAMWAMWAMWAMWAMWAMWAMWAMWAM

item.title: S1E7: The Opposite of Death is Gaming
item.description: While they're not gamers per se, on this episode of the Foolish Talk and Frenzy podcast, Matt and Darby occasionally touch on this episode's topic: gaming, in all its forms. Tangents include Middlebrook crickets, Matt's funeral, Diary of a Wimpy Kid, and Days of Our Lives. Thank you for listening, and if you're feeling frisky, send us an email at foolishtalkandfrenzy@gmail.com!
item.itunes:summary: While they're not gamers per se, on this episode of the Foolish Talk and Frenzy podcast, Matt and Darby occasionally touch on this episode's topic: gaming, in all its forms. Tangents include Middlebrook crickets, Matt's funeral, Diary of a Wimpy Kid, and Days of Our Lives. Thank you for listening, and if you're feeling frisky, send us an email at foolishtalkandfrenzy@gmail.com!
item.itunes:subtitle: Brett's soccer experience is a major point of contention.

item.title: S1E8: Many Feet Away With Many People In-Between
item.description: Hop on board an audio cruise of infectious fun, quarentine yourself for the next 36 minutes while you hear your favorite cohosts Matt and Darby talk about spring break, time off, advice, cyclists, memes, and more! Send us an email at foolishtalkandfrenzy@gmail.com.
item.itunes:summary: Hop on board an audio cruise of infectious fun, quarentine yourself for the next 36 minutes while you hear your favorite cohosts Matt and Darby talk about spring break, time off, advice, cyclists, memes, and more! Send us an email at foolishtalkandfrenzy@gmail.com.
item.itunes:subtitle: Stay healthy, everyone!

item.title: S1E9: There Have Been Doin's in the World
item.description: Fear not, the Foolish Talk and Frenzy Podcast continues! Amidst the current goings-on in the world, relax by listening to Matt and Darby converse. Stay safe and healthy! Tell us how you're spending your time now by emailing us at foolishtalkandfrenzy@gmail.com!
item.itunes:summary: Fear not, the Foolish Talk and Frenzy Podcast continues! Amidst the current goings-on in the world, relax by listening to Matt and Darby converse. Stay safe and healthy! Tell us how you're spending your time now by emailing us at foolishtalkandfrenzy@gmail.com!
item.itunes:subtitle: Feenage Tutant Ninja Turtles.

item.title: S1E10: Crazy Time in 1022
item.description: Snack on some sound bites from your two favourite podcast hosts, Matt and Darby! This week, Girl Scout cookies, Pringles, salt and vinegar chips, goldfish, Cheez-Its, really spicy hot sauce, burnt popcorn, labneh, and apples are all on the table for our hosts to chew over!
item.itunes:summary: Snack on some sound bites from your two favourite podcast hosts, Matt and Darby! This week, Girl Scout cookies, Pringles, salt and vinegar chips, goldfish, Cheez-Its, really spicy hot sauce, burnt popcorn, labneh, and apples are all on the table for our hosts to chew over!
item.itunes:subtitle: Dwelling on Snack Foods.

item.title: S1E11: We Are Your Hosts in This Wonderful Journey of Life
item.description: Matt and Darby provide audio entertainment for yet another week! On this episode: Matt and Darby's rooms. Link to the feedback form: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSfOJDAT3P4Lc1DqDMAIlLlwAuDDynaWqEV1qKTCx3JmP8hfZA/viewform *please don't succumb to a life of crime*

item.title: S1E12: Deep Vibes of Onion
item.description: This week, Matt and Darby reflect on their attitudes toward baking and cooking and reminisce about dishes they've made and ask the question we're all thnking: "Why have time on your hands when you could have dough on your hands?"
item.itunes:summary: This week, Matt and Darby reflect on their attitudes toward baking and cooking and reminisce about dishes they've made and ask the question we're all thnking: "Why have time on your hands when you could have dough on your hands?"

item.title: S1E13: The First Thread
item.description: This episode, Matt and Darby discuss their most requested topic: musical theater! Enjoy!
item.itunes:summary: This episode, Matt and Darby discuss their most requested topic: musical theater! Enjoy!

item.title: S1E14: Subs, Soup, and Teachers
item.description: Now that school's out for the summer, re-immerse yourself in the world of education as Matt and Darby discuss their school experiences, educational or otherwise.
item.itunes:summary: Now that school's out for the summer, re-immerse yourself in the world of education as Matt and Darby discuss their school experiences, educational or otherwise.
item.itunes:subtitle: Matt and Darby are in da haus.

item.title: S1E15: The Out-Of-Doors
item.description: Join us, as we abandon Charles Door's life work in favor of a world of biking, trees, and more: the great outdoors! *boys driving on Schram Road, please text Darby* Love you, dad!
item.itunes:summary: Join us, as we abandon Charles Door's life work in favor of a world of biking, trees, and more: the great outdoors! *boys driving on Schram Road, please text Darby* Love you, dad!
item.itunes:subtitle: No, really, who invented the door?

item.title: S1E16: That's the Power of Jazz
item.description: This week, Matt and Darby talk about classic literature, such as the Diary of a Wimpy Kid series. *Fletcher, if you're listening, please tell us the truth*
item.itunes:summary: This week, Matt and Darby talk about classic literature, such as the Diary of a Wimpy Kid series. *Fletcher, if you're listening, please tell us the truth*

item.description: In this released Patreon exculsive, Matt reflects on life, death, and bugs.
item.itunes:summary: In this released Patreon exculsive, Matt reflects on life, death, and bugs.

item.title: S1E17: The Podcast of Disagreements
item.description: Join us this week as Matt and Darby fail to come to a consensus on liquids with an artifically elevated temperature.
item.itunes:summary: Join us this week as Matt and Darby fail to come to a consensus on liquids with an artifically elevated temperature.
item.itunes:subtitle: In which it is discovered that Darby has synesthesia.

item.title: S1E18: A Really Big Ball of Twine
item.description: Matt and Darby discuss times during which they have been paid for serivces, and maybe even goods. Tune in to hear Matt and Darby's dream jobs, discussions of their work experiences, and yearnings to visit the world's largest ball of twine.
item.itunes:summary: Matt and Darby discuss times during which they have been paid for serivces, and maybe even goods. Tune in to hear Matt and Darby's dream jobs, discussions of their work experiences, and yearnings to visit the world's largest ball of twine.
item.itunes:subtitle: How does one end a podcast?

item.title: S1E19: The Case of the Mysterious Thief
item.description: This episode, the podcast co-hosts you know and love claim to be talking about mysteries.
item.itunes:summary: This episode, the podcast co-hosts you know and love claim to be talking about mysteries.
item.itunes:subtitle: We try out best to respond to emails, we really do.

item.title: S1E20: The Natural Phenomenon that is Science Class
item.description: Listen to Matt and Darby relive their favourite memories relating to their science classes on the twentieth episode of the Foolish Talk and Frenzy podcast!
item.itunes:summary: Listen to Matt and Darby relive their favourite memories relating to their science classes on the twentieth episode of the Foolish Talk and Frenzy podcast!
item.itunes:subtitle: This testimony will be used against Matt in a court of law.

item.title: S1E21: The Wildest West
item.description: This week, Matt chooses to send our co-hosts on a wild journey in, you guessed it, the west. Email us at foolishtalkandfrenzy@gmail.com. Please.
item.itunes:summary: This week, Matt chooses to send our co-hosts on a wild journey in, you guessed it, the west. Email us at foolishtalkandfrenzy@gmail.com. Please.
item.itunes:subtitle: Ba na naaaa! Wow wow woooooow.

item.title: S1E22: There's Some Oranges In-Between
item.description: If a tree falls in the forest, and nobody is around to hear it, it obviously makes a sound. The more important question is "What sound does a falling tree make?" While it's probably not the correct answer, it would sure be neat if the sound of a socially distant falling tree was the dulcet tones of Matt and Darby's voices as they discussed plants.
item.itunes:summary: If a tree falls in the forest, and nobody is around to hear it, it obviously makes a sound. The more important question is "What sound does a falling tree make?" While it's probably not the correct answer, it would sure be neat if the sound of a socially distant falling tree was the dulcet tones of Matt and Darby's voices as they discussed plants.
item.itunes:subtitle: The Orange-Grapefruit Continuum

item.description: Listen to two members of the best group project, the Foolish Talk and Frenzy podcast, discuss group projects!

item.title: S1E25: Death Be Parted and Here Pronounced
item.description: Whether you've arrived here by your own free will or by the machinations of the universe, and whether you are listening in 2020, or 5020, we're glad you've joined us, as authors Matt and Darby weave a taspestry of words on this episode of the Foolish Talk and Frenzy podcast.

item.itunes:subtitle: WELCOME TO SUPER SLAMM LAZER TAG

item.title: S1E26: An Adhesives-Related Episode in Which Duct Tape is Only Mentioned as Being Inferior to Gaff Tape
item.description: Join Matt and Darby as they discuss BrainPop, guilds, a prank or two, fancy letters, and more, but never seriously consider duct tape.
item.itunes:summary: Join Matt and Darby as they discuss BrainPop, guilds, a prank or two, fancy letters, and more, but never seriously consider duct tape.
item.itunes:subtitle: I mean, c'mon.

item.title: S1E28: The End of All Things (Or at Least Season 1)
item.description: This week, Season 1 of the Foolish Talk and Frenzy podcast wraps up with a discussion about finales. Thanks to all our loyal listeners, and see you in Season 2!
item.itunes:summary: This week, Season 1 of the Foolish Talk and Frenzy podcast wraps up with a discussion about finales. Thanks to all our loyal listeners, and see you in Season 2!

item.title: S2E1: Tryin' Out the Cheeses
item.description: Kick off the new school year by listening to the first episode of Season 2 of the Foolish Talk and Frenzy podcast, in which Matt and Darby discuss beginnings!
item.itunes:summary: Kick off the new school year by listening to the first episode of Season 2 of the Foolish Talk and Frenzy podcast, in which Matt and Darby discuss beginnings!

item.title: S2E2: 😈
item.description: Villanry: for it or against it, it's a fascinating topic that has been so far overlooked by the Foolish Talk and Frenzy podcast. Well, no more!
item.itunes:summary: Villanry: for it or against it, it's a fascinating topic that has been so far overlooked by the Foolish Talk and Frenzy podcast. Well, no more!
item.itunes:subtitle: Yeah, baby!

item.title: S2E3: The Whole Al Capone Thing
item.description: You'll want to sit down for this: an entire episode on chairs. Well, maybe not all about chairs, but who can blame university-wide recognized podcast hosts Matt and Darby if they get a little sidetracked?
item.itunes:summary: You'll want to sit down for this: an entire episode on chairs. Well, maybe not all about chairs, but who can blame university-wide recognized podcast hosts Matt and Darby if they get a little sidetracked?
item.itunes:subtitle: If anybody finds out where this text shows up, email us!

item.title: S2E4: Все русское звучит одинаково
item.description: Почему вы тратите время на перевод? Очевидно, это русский выпуск подкаста «Глупые разговоры и безумие». Если вы так далеко зашли в переводе или знаете русский язык, напишите нам! Мы хотели бы услышать от вас!
item.itunes:summary: Почему вы тратите время на перевод? Очевидно, это русский выпуск подкаста «Глупые разговоры и безумие». Если вы так далеко зашли в переводе или знаете русский язык, напишите нам! Мы хотели бы услышать от вас!
item.itunes:subtitle: возгласы ликования!
